amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy to consult with the head of each major national organization that represents law enforcement officers, agencies, or associations, prior to making recommendations to the President on the national budget for drug control and enforcement each year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 109-387 to direct the ONDCP to consult with the head of each major national organization that represents law enforcement officers, agencies, or associations, prior to making recommendations to the President on the national budget for drug control and enforcement each year.
